name: obsidian-bookmarks-importer
description: Import browser bookmarks from HTML files with HD screenshots and organize them as beautiful Obsidian notes with cards, table, or list views

scripts.build-plugin: npm run build && npm run copy-files
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Sam Marxz <sammarxzz@gmail.com> (https://github.com/sammarxz)
